comment.body: Should we create an __awesome-zeronet__ list somewhere ? I also have a couple of ressources that might be usefull to dev.
I was there I can confirm. It would be cool to have some people to join next year and offer workshop ? I really enjoyed those 3 days. Lots of fun/ nice people/ interesting talk.
Yes I thought about this.

> Also 'ZeroLSTN' is misspelled on the bottom link :P
Sorry I am going to fix it
@Lola: Fixed. I am going to create a proper section in the next release. In the footer it is not really noticeable.
Lol. Going to see David Guetta. I am actually not excited about that...
@styromaniac@zeroid.bit: He is the head line of a festival in Serbia. I will let you know if my ear start to bleed when he enters the main stage...
Is it the torrent plugin test site ?
@styromaniac@zeroid.bit: Lol. I didn't even know people were aware of it. I haven't worked on this plugin for a year. If people are using it I can update it.
@styromaniac@zeroid.bit: Yes just updated it to rev 3535 it is also broken for me. Going to work on a quick fix. Thanks for notifying me.
ThunderWave is also broken for me.
@Glightstar: I swear it wasn't me. I am an innocent person. ;)

I think I got it. If your javascript file is bigger than 1MB it is consider a big file and it is now trying to break it which leads to an error and no file javascript file loaded. At least I believe it is what's happening...
Looking at http://127.0.0.1:43110/mixtape.bit/dist/all.js it shows where in the code the error is raised.
ThunderWave has the same error : http://127.0.0.1:43110/thunderwave.bit/js/all.js
And the file is also bigger than 1MB. So for now I guess we need to optimize our code !
It would allow you to get file from the torrent network and also seed files to this network. I am not sure it will really help with your issue with the bandwith... The user would have a copy yes.

I started the plugin because BigFile feature wasn''t on Zeronet yet. Today it offers a bridge between the 2 networks. It would also allow to create a bridge with peertube (a really nice project). Beside that it is not a really usefull plugin I am afraid....
@Styromaniac: If I remember the documentation if it doesn't have any peers it will connect to webseed servers.
I personally use cucumber and lemon from time to time.
I love this channel and also computerphile.
You always want that update ;)
This is my default license : https://github.com/rllola/zeroTube/blob/master/LICENSE.txt
I guess this issue should be in the `zeronet-kivy` repo. Unfortunately, I havent been able to have it working on my computer. Also this project need a maintainer as no one is working on this anymore.
@Styromaniac: Yes I forwarded your issue to this repo.
I am not sure what is voluntaryism but I like it.
I don't think so. Some people may stick with us.
@Moor: ðŸ˜‚
Bonjour Imberbeman
There is also [OpenCollective](https://opencollective.com/) (clearnet) not sure how it compared to Patreon.
Y a les vidÃ©os de France Inter sur PeerTube ? Nice

@Styromaniac: Yeah sorry ! I was saying there is France Inter videos and this is cool. It is a public radio that I listen a lot and usually on YT but now that it is on PeerTube I shall install it right away.
I really like this one
Actually I was thinking of something similar but bigger. The image in blurried in the back and the full image in a smaller square on the front and adding a proper player.
@Styromaniac: Sweet! I am think I am going to finish first with some refactoring and I want to add France Culture podcasts automatically using a small script.
I was going to go with a mixtape... Maybe something with less details so it can be use as a favicon.
@Styromaniac: I like this one (https://pngimage.net/wp-content/uploads/2018/06/kassette-png-6.png) Going to test it.
@Styromaniac: Ah ah yes. It is pretty cool.
I use [Bity](https://bity.com/) (clearnet). It is Swiss and they don't hold funds for you (it is more like a broker). But also full disclosure I worked on it.

Lol. Is the pun intended?

I've personally since very recently been aspiring in appearing in telenovelas in South America.
Fuck... I will have this lower.
@Styromaniac: Yep. I will fix and publish it with the next changes. Thanks for letting me know ;)
Might be both. I recently saw an article on a guy who was feeding is robot with reddit posts for it to become a psychopath.
@Styromaniac: I have to say I am utterly fascinated by this guy. He seems to be on a crusade of educating people who asked him jack shit. Some people need to take a clue.

@Styromaniac: I am just being cynical. I don't give a fuck about this guy. I just find it really absurd his jesus 2.0 quest bullshit and so common at the time. He is like 97% of the dudes on the internet.
Lol. The guy is having a serious breakdown. Save yourself and mute him. I have done it a long time ago.

If anything I would be interested in a new implementation of it in a more performant language (like rust?). And it could still be compatible with this implementation. I do wish good luck for the person brave enough to do that. Some people have been quite hateful/nasty on the repo. I don't think anyone wants to sign up for that...
